items.name: Rumi's Concoction
explicitMods: +10% Chance to Block Attack Damage during Effect
+6% Chance to Block Spell Damage during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world.
Today I am wise, so I am changing myself."

items.name: Victory Veil
implicitMods: 8% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
explicitMods: +2 to Level of all Minion Skill Gems

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% reduced Chaining range
Projectiles from Supported Skills have 4.8 metres maximum range
Supported Skills have 40% less Area of Effect
Supported Skills Deal 43% more Damage with Hits against Branded Enemy
Supported Skills are Triggered by Arcanist Brand, from the Brand's location
hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Chaos, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their chaos resistance.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -30% to Chaos Resistance
Cursed enemies take 10% increased Damage from Damage Over Time effects
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Desecrates the ground, summoning corpses and dealing chaos damage to all enemies in the area. The corpses will be chosen from the monsters in the current area and any Spectres that have existed in this instance.
explicitMods: Deals 294 Base Chaos Damage per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Consumes a corpse, granting all of your minions the power to block both attacks and spells. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration for each corpse consumed.
explicitMods: Additional 1.00 seconds Base Duration per extra corpse Consumed
Grants Minions +36% Chance to Block Attack Damage
Grants Minions +35% Chance to Block Spell Damage
Grants Minions 4% of Life Regenerated per Second if they have Blocked recently
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Grim League
enchantMods: Regenerate 2% of Life per second if you were Hit Recently

socketedItems.secDescrText: Raises a spectral version of a defeated foe as a minion to fight for you in battle.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills which create Minions.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Animates a melee weapon or armour, attaching it to an invisible Guardian that fights by your side. Animating multiple items attaches them to the same Guardian. You cannot animate unidentified items. Cannot be used by Traps or Mines.

Minions' Attacks deal 126 to 184 additional Physical Damage
Minions deal 76% increased Physical Damage with Melee Attacks

items.name: The Surrender
flavourText: but are silenced by our flesh
and so we give up our flesh.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. If dual wielding attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one hit. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
explicitMods: When Dual Wielding, Deals 75% Damage from each Weapon combined
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal arcing lightning damage to attackers when you block them.
explicitMods: Buff grants +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage while holding a Shield
